text: Paligongo lya yalakweyi twalamwile ŵanache ŵa Israila yanti: jwaawuleje mundu mwangali (kuti nkuwulajidwajo jwate kuwulaga) mundu jwine kapena kuwatanganya pa chilambo, basi iŵele mpela awuleje ŵandu wosope, nombe soni jwaakulupwisye umi wa mundu, basi iŵele mpela akulupwisye umi wa ŵandu wosope. Soni pamasile paŵayichilile achimitenga Ŵetu ni ilosyo yakuonechela, kaneko chisimu ŵajinji mwa ŵanganyao panyuma pa yalakweyo ŵapelenganyagape konanga pachilambo
